body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Scott Turner and I'm from AutoCare Solutions. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Marie. Could you confirm your date of birth? I need to update our records.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's the twenty-fifth of June, nineteen ninety-three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Also, could you provide me with your contact number? We may need to reach out to you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's seven one four, five five five, eight eight one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marie, for providing the information. Is there anything specific I can help you with today regarding our products or services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm feeling disappointed about the product quality I received from your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Marie. I will ensure your feedback is passed on to the relevant team. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Marie. Have a great day.
